LanguageData.XFMParmor_ArcticWind.label: arctic gale
LanguageData.XFMParmor_IceSpike.label: ice spike
LanguageData.XFMParmor_IceSpike.description: The ice spikes provide cover for mechframes, pierce enemy that step onto it and detonates, potentially setting off adjacent ice spikes in a chain reaction. They self-detonate if remain inactive for too long.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Aqua.label: mechframe core: owl
LanguageData.XFMParmor_MechanicalArmorCore_Aqua.comps: >Attacks hostiles with ranged attack. >Adjust weapon mode according to target distance. >If avaliable, automatically use frozen flood. >When harmed by melee damage, use frozen flood towards damage source if avaliable. >Attack targets currently bleeding with arctic gale if avaliable.
Toggles the compound lance between speed mode and precision mode.
Spawns the arctic gale at target location. The arctic gale damages enemy within effect area and transform their spilling blood into deadly ice splinters.
Sprays out a wave of ice spikes that can be used as cover or to harm passing enemies.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Aqua.label: compound lance
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Aqua.description: Under speed mode, the compound lance can rapidly fire powerful charge shots.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Aqua.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Aqua_Bullet.label: charge shot
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_AquaB.label: compound lance
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_AquaB.description: Under precision mode, the compound lance shoots laser aiming at enemy's brain with pinpoint accuracy. The laser also inflicts frozen effect which enables more wounds to be caused by attacks, and spreads to nearby enemy upon death.
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_AquaB.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_BloodIce.label: blood ice
LanguageData.XFMParmor_Weapon_Frost_Bullet.label: frost ray
